name: NewScientist
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Love the New Scientist magazine? Now you can get it direct through Alexa! After enabling the skill, just ask, "play my flash briefing" to hear an overview of today's science. An unofficial skill that reads from the newscientist.com RSS feed to provide you with the latest news.
If you have other news sources enabled, you will have to wait through them before getting to the New Scientist. To fix this, in the Settings section of the Alexa app, select Flash Briefing, then 'change order'. Then, drag New Scientist to the top of your stack.

Find more science at www.youtube.com/nitrojonscience/
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
